A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay\, I was very careful in my wording here. The best way to put it is Force Awakens felt like a remake\, but it was a good remake and it left us with a lot of fun questions and speculations. The Last Jedi ruined much of what Force Awakens set up in a way that felt insulting to me. Added to that\, the movie used far too much cheap humor at the expense of what could have been meaningful scenes. Finally\, I hate when films rely on deus ex machina to solve problems\, but since its a fantasy it can be expected. However\, this movie used it very liberally and in ways that I couldn't justify. I felt embarrassed and kept having to cover my face and shake my head. I have never been so disappointed by something I was so excited about.
